text: Kitabigana apanara kache tadera jan'ya asamana hate ekati kitaba nayila karate bale; tara musara kache era ceye'o bara dabi karechila. Tara balechila, â€˜amaderake prakasye allahake dekha'o.â€™ Phale tadera simalanghanera karane taderake bajra pakara'o karechila; tarapara spasta pramana tadera kache asara para'o tara bachurake upasyarupe grahana karechila; atahpara amara ta ksama karechilama ebam amara musake spasta pramana pradana karechilama
